alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 12:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, southwestern Wakulla and central Franklin Counties through 115 PM EDT/1215 PM CDT/... At 1228 PM EDT/1128 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Apalachicola, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Nine Mile, Carrabelle Beach, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Royal Bluff, Mcintyre, High Bluff, Yent Place, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Tilton and Green Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Gulf
